titleStmt.title: Will 320 AD
titleStmt.author: Valerius Aion, centurion, son of Atisios and Timarete

msContents.summary: Will of Valerius Aion who was stricken with a serious illness; his wife, daugther, and his 5 brothers and sisters are his heirs; the centurion Apion is the executor and 7 more centurions are witnesses; all Aion

msItem.note: Papyrus in very poor condition; only the right third is well preserved; 2 of the small fragments have not been placed yet
Written along the fibers; the back is blank
31 lines of writing by a proficient hand, which is very regular and upright

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from Mr. Blanchard through H.I. Bell, in 1924; no. 38 in Bell

div.ab: In the consulate of our masters Constantinus Augustus for the 6th time and Constantinus the most illustrious Caesar for the I st time, Phamenoth 18.
